categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A skirmish over Ylesia took place around 1 BBY during the Galactic Civil War. Forces of the Galactic Empire battled with the insurgent forces of the Alliance to Restore the Republic over the planet Ylesia. During the battle, the Rebels captured the EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Salvation. The Salvation was later placed under the command of Rebel Captain Juno Eclipse.
